category.name: Classification
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: ICS_show_multiple_classification_tooltip
preference.preference_description: Specifies the attribute IDs displayed in the multiple classification tab tooltips. In addition to the common ICO attributes, the following internal attributes can be used: -570 WSO Type -572 WSO Name -599 ICO Object ID -600 Class ID -607 Class Name -630 Class Unit -732 ICO Type If an attribute is specified in this preference but is not available in the ICO, it is ignored in the tooltip. The values are displayed in the following format: Attribute Name: Attribute Value The default value is: -600
